markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Titan Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=3785) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 10, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 101</row>

</column>

---

Your limbs tense as you deliver a mighty swing. Make a melee Strike. If it hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage and [push](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the target back by 5 feet. If you're at least 10th level, increase this to two extra dice and push the target by 10 feet, and if you're at least 18th level, increase it to three extra dice and push the target by 15 feet.
name: Titan Swing

summary_markdown: Your limbs tense as you deliver a mighty swing.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Limited" > Titan Swing Two Actions May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers Source Gatewalkers Player's Guide pg. 10, Dark Archive pg. 101 --- Your limbs tense as you deliver a mighty swing. Make a melee Strike. If it hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage and push the target back by 5 feet. If you're at least 10th level, increase this to two extra dice and push the target by 10 feet, and if you're at least 18th level, increase it to three extra dice and push the target by 15 feet.
